metadata.title: The Effects of Hypericum perforatum Nanoemulsion on Streptococcus Mutans Biofilm Amir Zandesh1, Soodabeh Kimyai2, Sara Ghadaksaz1, Yasna Panahi1, Behnaz Karimzadeh1 and Solmaz Maleki Dizaj3,*

conclusion.heading: Conclusion
conclusion.first_sentence: The prepared nanoemulsion showed the lowest MIC, MBC, and MBIC values among the studied groups, indicating its antibacterial and antibiofilm effectiveness.
